name: color-mapping
title: Color Mapping
description: Trying to remove legacy colors and raw hex values from your codebase? This extension finds the nearest approved color from a set of pre-defined values for you to use
author: p44v9n

commands.name: search-closest-hex
commands.title: Search Closest Hex Color
commands.description: Find the closest hex color from your Tailwind-style list

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
